CustomField.description: Set this checkbox to enable notification emails for eRelease Requests. This functionality replaces the workflow-based notifications. The corresponding workflow for this Application should be deactivated when this box is checked, otherwise recipients may receive duplicate notifications.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set this checkbox to enable notification emails for eRelease Requests. To avoid duplicate notifications, disable the corresponding eRelease Request notification workflow for this Application.
CustomField.label: Enable ERR Notification Emails
